text: Robin Thicke net worth : Robin Thicke is an American singer, producer and song writer who has a net worth of $ 15 million dollars. Robin Thicke was born on March 10, 1977 in Los Angeles, California. He is the son of actors Alan Thicke and Gloria Loring. Robin knew he wanted to be a singer from a very early age. When his father objected, Robin borrowed $ 1000 from an uncle to record a demo tape. That demo tape made the rounds to a few notable musicians. When Brian McKnight heard the tape, he invited Robin into the studio to lay down some tracks. Robin released his debut album ` ` A Beautiful World'' in 2003. His second album was 2006's ` ` The Evolution of Robin Thicke'' which sold 1. 5 million
